title: London/Hammersmith and Fulham
name: Ravenscourt Park
content: An eight hectare park in Hammersmith with a long history. It is home to a lake, tea house, tennis courts, an all-weather football pitch, a bowling green, areas in which to just sit or play, a garden centre and some truly ancient trees, particularly cedars. | image=Lake in Ravenscourt Park - geograph.org.uk - 1231556.jpg
